record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I now ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:24 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, June 14, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
